animals.name: Serious Cat
animals.info: A cat with a serious demeanor, ready for battle.

animals.name: Baby Panda
animals.info: An adorable panda cub in leather armor.

animals.name: Beagle
animals.info: A loyal beagle ready for adventure.

animals.name: Regal Cat
animals.info: A majestic cat with the air of ancient Egypt.

animals.name: Brave Cat
animals.info: A fluffy white cat, small but courageous.

animals.name: Gerbil
animals.info: A tiny gerbil, armored and ready for big adventures.

animals.name: Hamster
animals.info: A hamster wielding a sword, prepared for epic battles.

animals.name: Earnest Squirrel
animals.info: An earnest squirrel, standing tall in its armor.

animals.name: Warrior Squirrel
animals.info: A squirrel knight, the protector of the forest.

fights.outcome: Regal Cat rips the Baby Panda's face off
Baby Panda paws Hamster to smithereens
Baby Panda whacks Earnest Squirrel really hard
Warrior Squirrel unexpectedly slays Baby Panda
Beagle chews Gerbil like a squeaky toy
Beagle catches Earnest Squirrel in his mouth
Regal Cat eats Gerbil for lunch
Regal Cat defeats Warrior Squirrel in single combat
Hamster pokes Brave Cat with his sword and Brave Cat runs away
Warrior Squirrel bashes Brave Cat with his tail
Hamster stabs Gerbil in his fluffy butt with a sword
Earnest Squirrel boxes Gerbil about the ears until he's concussed
Hamster defeats Earnest Squirrel in a close battle
Warrior Squirrel punts Hamster like a fluffy football
Warrior Squirrel whoops Earnest Squirrel's butt

conversations.outcome: Baby Panda preaches philosophy to Serious Cat and Serious Cat gets bored and falls asleep.
Serious Cat tells Beagle that he's a stupid dog and Beagle does not disagree but gets distracted by a butterfly.
Regal Cat recites ancient cat laws to Serious Cat and then takes his fish.
Serious Cat condescends to Brave Cat and then walks away.
Serious Cat tries to tell Gerbil how awesome cats are, but Gerbil starts yammering really fast and Serious Cat gets scared and goes away.
Hamster yells Norwegian battlecries at Serious Cat.
Earnest Squirrel tells Serious Cat all of the squirrely secrets of the universe.
Warrior Squirrel describes the Great WAy to Serious Cat
Baby Panda and Beagle agree to be friends and not talk to cats anymore.
Regal Cat yawns and goes to sleep on Baby Panda's belly and Baby Panda falls asleep too.
Baby Panda ignores Brave Cat who talks at length about fish.
Baby Panda tells Gerbil to chill out
Baby Panda condescends to Hamster
Earnest Squirrel impresses Baby Panda with his solemn wisdom
Baby Panda and Warrior Squirrel have a long and thoughtful conversation
Regal Cat tells Serious Cat that he's too serious and not smart
Serious Cat tells Brave cat he is stupid
Serious Cat rolls his eyes at Gerbil and walks away
Serious Cat chides Hamster for being bellicose
Earnest Squirrel and Serious Cat decide they definitely do not like each other
Warrior Squirrel berates Serious Cat for his lack of contributions to the animal kingdom
Regal Cat insults Serious Cat, saying he's all whiskers and no claws.
Regal Cat admonishes Gerbil for being so crazy.
Regal Cat mentors Hamster in the ways of warrior kings
Regal Cat and Earnest Squirrel face off in a battle of wits and both leave satisfied
Regal Cat insults Warrior Squirrel and they vow to be enemies forever more
Brave Cat offers Gerbil some advice but Gerbil starts blabbering about carrots
Hamster tells Brave Cat he's a coward and Brave Cat turns into a cheeseball
Earnest Squirrel is kind to Brave Cat and they leave as friends
Warrior Squirrel stares at Brave Cat until he meows like a kitten
Hamster tries to speak to Gerbil but Gerbil starts screaming madly
Earnest Squirrel is seriously disturbed by Gerbil
Warrior Squirrel sits silently as Gerbil blabbers nonsense
Earnest Squirrel tells Hamster he has the makings of a scholar warrior
Warrior Squirrel and Hamster get drunk and play poker.
Earnest Squirrel convinces Warrior Squirrel to hand over all his nuts for the winter.
